text: I personally would love to see a loading butt :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
Thanks, it's not commonly asked to have cards on activities tab, that are not some sort of 'activity log'. So it's very interesting that you see it differently
Owner ID has come up a earlier as well. I will look into it.

Are there any premade HubSpot CRM Development Figma components? If not, I've made some for a project I'm working on myself and would love to make it a FOSS type thing in hopes of getting contributors. Right now I have CRM Card, Buttons, StepIndicator and a couple more. fyi if anyone wants me to compile it somewhere.
Thank you, so I'm guessing debugging isn't an option?
Yeah its not even that the card is an activity log, it's just I want certain cards to be seen where people are already looking.
Last I heard itâ€™s not public yet but they are working on it.
Good to know, thank you. I'll just wireframe it in that case
